You CAN play online with this version. I have just tried playing multiplayer and it works. To get past the "Enter Serial", go to your installed game folder, and look for a "mbreg.exe". Run it, select "Warband" and that's it. You can now play online. Hope this helped!

To change language:
1)start the game
2) at the start up screen they're 3 options Pick the middle one
3) the configure screen will pop up>Click the drop down box and you will see an option for english.
